name: A.S.A.P.O.S
description:
A Shitty Ass Piece Of Shit

How to Play:

Grab : Moves Enemys Towards you.

Stun : Stuns enemy for 1.5 seconds.

Counter : Dodges enemys attacks. ( Use when Lightning Icon appear on top of enemy.)

Strike : Hit Enemy.

Takedown : Put's you in slow motion.

How to use:

Fill the ComboBar, Then press T on your keyboard

It will put you in Slow Motion, then select up to five enemys to instant kill using your left mouse button then press T again.
